Headline: Temporary Eastbound #60 Blue Island/26th Reroute near 26th/Pulaski
ShortDescription: Eastbound 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Pulaski, 31st, and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near 26th/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Pulaski, 31st, and Lawndale: due to, street blockage near 26th/Pulaski.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Harlem and Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem/Lake and Clark/Lake due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Harlem/Lake and Clark/Lake due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Clark/Lake and 63rd-
Ashland/Cottage Grove at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Harlem/Lake and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
